segments.text: It â€™ s a wonderful party , Joan , The food , the drink , the atmosphere ... Everyone is enjoying himself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks to your help.To our friendship .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bottoms up ! By the way what kind of entertainment are we gonna have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dancing . The boys from the Campus Band have promised to play music for us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , how wonderful ! Every girl on the campus has a crush on those handsome guys .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll surely make introductions for them .
segments.speaker: S2
